Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
15.07.2014 SH SCR19014 Renamed program to "BSF400-A1 ING Direct ES Split File"
-- Set/reset output parameters
-- Prepare variables
... convert file to internal UTF-8 encoding (in case conversion fails in GB324 job turns to MSGW)
-- Check if file has to be splitted
-- Start to split file
... workaround to solve problem when file is read again after check if split is necessary
move input file to \handeld directory
-- Extract prefix and suffix (=extension) form original filename, in R.S. a
unique number is added before the extension part of the filename for every
new file
-- Add unique extension to filename, before the real extension part
-- Nothing is written to single file, delete file
-- Convert UNIX based text-files to Windows format, only if programs runs nativ on AS400
-- If last read row was a detail row, we're dealing with a change to split
the file, so next new file starts with a detail row
... set to blank, necessary in case last row of file is written to new file, if
there is only row left, to avoid writing of the same row again in R.S.
-- Reset variables
